SEARCH
Package com.pomodorotimer.pomodorotimer

Class HuffmanCoding

java.lang.Object
com.pomodorotimer.pomodorotimer.HuffmanCoding
public class HuffmanCoding extends Object
Huffman Coding implementation for text compression/decompression. Used for lossless text compression.

Use-case: Text compression/decompression tool where we need to reduce file size while maintaining lossless decompression.

Time Complexity: O(n log n) where n is the number of unique characters

Space Complexity: O(n)

Version:
1.0
Author:
Data Structures Project Team
